com.ems.service

Class FileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ems.service.AbstractFileService
      • com.ems.service.FileService

  • public class FileService
extends AbstractFileService
    The Class FileService. This class provides abstract class implementation for json file read/write/update operations.
